name: Mystery Series – A Vampire Tale Free
name_original: Mystery Series – A Vampire Tale Free
description:
Help young Caroline solve her father's mysterious disappearance in A Vampire Tale. Caroline's search leads her to Transylvania where she uncovers an ancient ruin and the prison of a centuries old vampire. Accidentally freeing the vampire sweeps Caroline into the middle of a vampire clan war that has raged for millennia. Help Caroline navigate the unexpected twists of treason and betrayal in this exciting Hidden Object game!
- Explore a mysterious world
- Beautiful gothic artwork
- Amazing replay value

This app is compatible with iPad 1, iPad 2, iPad 3rd generation, iPad 4th generation and iPad mini.
